## Description

ORIE 3120, "Practical Tools for Operations Research, Machine Learning, and Data Science" has a rather self-explanatory name. [Here](https://people.orie.cornell.edu/pfrazier/orie3120/) is the course website, which has all the relevant resources. (Note that this page refers to the 2021 Spring semester and may be outdated for future semesters.)
